line_1: And not to stretch a narrow fancy,
line_2: To shew what pretty things I can say,

line_1: Or, not to rove, and pump one's Fancy
She chants the sad thoughts of her fancy,

line_2: And now I doat on sprightly Nancy.

line_1: When ye were just o' the same fancy,
line_2: Ye cried — Ne'er tak an auld man, Nancy.

line_1: She striding forward, to my fancy,
